Package org.academics.dal

Class dbInstructor

java.lang.Object
org.academics.dal.dbInstructor
public class dbInstructor extends Object
This class provides methods to fetch data from the database pertaining to instructor.

      This method fetches the instructor ID of the instructor with the given email ID.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose instructor ID is to be fetched
      Returns:
      the instructor ID of the instructor with the given email ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error with database access

    • fetchCourses

      public static ResultSet fetchCourses(int instructorID) throws SQLException
      Fetches all the courses taught by the instructor with the given ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      instructorID - The ID of the instructor whose courses are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The ResultSet object containing the courses taught by the instructor.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL query.

      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the approved courses
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error with the SQL query

    • checkCourseApproval

      public static boolean checkCourseApproval(String course_code) throws SQLException
      This method checks if a course with the given course code is approved by the Senate.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the code of the course to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the course is approved, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error with the SQL query

    • fetchCourseGrades

      public static ResultSet fetchCourseGrades(String course_code, String session) throws SQLException
      Fetches the grades of students in a particular course and session.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the course code of the course to fetch grades for
      session - the session to fetch grades for
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the course code, course name, semester, student ID, name, and grade for all students in the course and session
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL query

    • fetchStudentGrades

      public static ResultSet fetchStudentGrades(String studentID) throws SQLException
      Returns a ResultSet of grades for a given student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - ID of the student whose grades are to be fetched
      Returns:
      ResultSet of grades for the student
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error in executing the SQL query

    • isCourseInstructor

      public static boolean isCourseInstructor(String course_code, String semester, int instructorID) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a course with the given course code, semester, belongs to a given instructor ID
      Parameters:
      course_code - the course code to check
      semester - the semester to check
      instructorID - the instructor ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the course exists in the course_offerings table, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL query

    • isCourseFloated

      public static String isCourseFloated(String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      Checks if the course has already been floated in the given semester
      Parameters:
      course_code - The code of the course to check
      semester - The semester to check
      Returns:
      A string message indicating if the course is already floated or null if it is not floated yet
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error executing the SQL query

    • delistCourse

      public static boolean delistCourse(String course_code, String semester, int instructorID) throws SQLException
      Delete a course from the list of courses offered by an instructor
      Parameters:
      course_code - course code of the course to be deleted
      semester - semester in which the course is offered
      instructorID - ID of the instructor
      Returns:
      true if the course is deleted, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there's an error executing the SQL statement

    • uploadGrades

      public static int uploadGrades(String filePath, String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException, IOException
      Uploads grades for students in a course and semester from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      course_code - the course code for which to upload the grades
      semester - the semester for which to upload the grades
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the CSV file

    • fetchStudentsList

      public static ResultSet fetchStudentsList(String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      Fetches a result set of all students enrolled in a given course and semester.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the course code to fetch students for
      semester - the semester to fetch students for
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the enrollment ID, student ID, and name of each enrolled student
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • floatCourse

      public static boolean floatCourse(String course_code, String semester, int instructorID, int enrollmentCount, double qualify, ArrayList<String> preRequisites) throws SQLException
      Adds a new course offering in the database.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the code of the course to float
      semester - the semester of the course offering
      instructorID - the ID of the instructor for the course
      enrollmentCount - the enrollment count for the course offering
      qualify - the qualification score required for the course offering
      preRequisites - the prerequisites for the course offering
      Returns:
      true if the course offering was successfully floated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateCourseMapping

      public static void updateCourseMapping(String course_code, String semester, List<Integer> departmentIds, List<Integer> batches, List<String> courseTypes) throws SQLException
      Updates course mappings in the database for a given course code, semester, and other parameters.
      Parameters:
      course_code - The code of the course being mapped.
      semester - The semester for which the course is being mapped.
      departmentIds - A list of department IDs to map the course to.
      batches - A list of batches to map the course to.
      courseTypes - A list of course types to map the course to.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.
